name: 楊元森
objective: This course is intended to provide the students with theory and application of structural analysis as applies to trusses, beams, and frames. This semester of this course focuses on analysis of statically determinate structures.
schedule:
W01: Types of structures and loads
W02: Basic analysis of statically determinate structures
W03-04: Internal forces of trusses 
W05-07: Internal loadings developed in structural members
W08: Influence lines of statically determinate structures
W09: Midterm
W10: Elastic beam theory
W11: Double integration method
W12: Conjugate-beam method
W13-16: Deflections using energy methods
W17: Review of statically determinate structural deflections  
W18: Final examination
scorePolicy:
Attendance, quiz, lecture activity: 20% +/- 5%
Midterm: 30% +/- 5%
Final Exam.: 50% +/- 10%
Failure Due to Absences (FDA): Absences of more than 6 hours may result in a failing grade.
materials:
R. C. Hibbeler (2020). Structural Analysis 10ed. ISBN: 978-1-292-24713-7 (http://www.gau-lih.com.tw/tier/front/bin/ptdetail.phtml?Part=VX0417&Category=0)

The textbook is required (printed or hand-writing manuscript, new or second-handed, digital or physical, bounded or unbounded).
